name: Let's Park Backyard Edition
description:
Welcome to the world of Parking Professionals School! With the help of an engine from the 70's, you will learn to park in such a way that no obstacle will be a problem in a future. In this racing-simulation game of Let's Park Backyard Edition your mission is to pass level by level that in the end of the school you become a really professional driver.

You will practice all kinds of challenges in the yard such as: turning 180 degrees, crossing small bridges with bumps and others.Do not hesitate to become one of the professionals. When you decide, you address us, we are always open.

Game Features :
- 40 levels
- Damage indicator.Bbe careful not to crash the car during the levels
- Abs, Esp & lights options.
